Overstock, if there is a problem fulfilling my order and you need to refund my # Bitcoin, here is an address you may use. I have NOTHING to do with Coinbase. cc: @ OverstockCEOpic.twitter.com/78lPGTQRRF

I made a purchase from Overstock. The Bitcoin I sent to Overstock was forwarded to a Coinbase account associated with the email address that I used. It seems like some sort of attempt to link identity/email/Coinbase accounts.
How will that prevent Overstock from diverting Bitcoin to a Coinbase account?
My favorite brewery is the one that accepts Bitcoin.
Please note that I said “account associated with that email address” and *NOT* “my account.” # Bitcoinhttps://twitter.com/haydentiff/status/993274037076885505 …
I couldn’t use Bitcoin to pay for my beer because Coinbase wasn’t functioning for the merchant.
I don’t want to touch Coinbase at all! Why did @ Overstock send them my Bitcoin????

Why is Coinbase ruining my life today? I placed a $600+ order on @ Overstock and for some reason the # Bitcoin I sent was credited to a Coinbase account associated with that email address? F*ck.
